release.change: Breaking Change: TTS and notification commands have new formats, refer to the companion docs for updated format.
<u>Wear OS:</u> Add support for entity states in complications
<u>Wear OS:</u> Show entity state in chip background
Add support for TLS client authentication, refer to the companion docs for setup instructions
Only apply prioritize internal to WebView when location is disabled on the device
Add themed icon for supported devices (Android 13+)
Add attribute to network type sensor to indicate if current network is a metered connection
Bug fixes, performance improvements, design tweaks and dependency updates
